rooms.description: A spacious lobby with a North-facing entrance leading to the apartment. The lobby is designed in accordance with Vastu, welcoming positive energy.
An open-plan living-dining area that acts as the main studio space. Large windows are incorporated for ample natural light and proper ventilation following Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated home office with a quiet view, positioned away from high-traffic areas while aligning with Vastu principles for productivity.
Compact and efficient servant's quarters designed to maintain privacy and comfort. Located in a less prominent area of the ground floor, ensuring functional separation as per local building norms.

openings.details: Primary entrance door with secure features and ample space for entry.
Large, multi-pane windows to maximize light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
A modest balcony space providing outdoor access while maintaining privacy.
